page.title: 11LIBRARY IN L. STAUGHTON
page.content: {The Library Van}visits Little Staughton every fortnight. It carries a stock of 2000 books, 7oo non-fiction 1000 fiction and 300 children's books. Romances are the most popular books with the adult population. Children under five years visit the library van more than older children because the older children are able to use the school library. There are four stops in little Staughton and approximately 20 books are borrowed at each stop.There is no limit to the number of books that can be borrowed but they have to be returned in three months.The library van visits{Keysoe}on Wednesday every fortnight. If people require a greater selection of books then they are able to visit the{County Library in Bedford.
